xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 3 Āsavagocchaka » 3.5 Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka » 3.5.7 Pañhāvāra » 3.5.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 3.5.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇādi
Āsavagocchaka
Āsavaāsavasampayuttaduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Ārammaṇādi
122.
1296Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1297Āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo āsavasampayuttassa ceva no ca āsavassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—  āsavasampayutte ceva no ca āsave khandhe ārabbha āsavasampayuttā ceva no ca āsavā khandhā uppajjanti. (1)
1298Āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—  āsavasampayutte ceva no ca āsave khandhe ārabbha āsavā uppajjanti. (2)
1299Āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca āsavasampayuttassa ceva no ca āsavassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—  āsavasampayutte ceva no ca āsave khandhe ārabbha āsavā ca āsavasampayuttakā ca khandhā uppajjanti. (3)
1300Āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo ca dhammā āsavassa ceva āsavasampayuttassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
1301Adhipatipaccayā…  (ārammaṇasadisā, garukārammaṇā) anantarapaccayā…  (ārammaṇasadisāyeva, purimā purimāti kātabbā.) Samanantarapaccayā…  sahajātapaccayā…  aññamaññapaccayā…  nissayapaccayā…  upanissayapaccayā. (Ārammaṇasadisaṃyeva, vibhajanā natthi…  tīṇi. Upanissayaṃ sabbaṃ kātabbaṃ.)
